title: The Yeti-Sasquach-Skunkape Audio Pack
description: The Yeti Sasquatch Skunkape pack is an audio pack you can use to create the sounds of the big mythological creature
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating sounds of a big mammal that walks on 2 legs like Skunkape or Sasquatch or Yeti.


Audio Demo

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Fist Slams (For attack sounds)
  • Step Sounds (On different surfaces)
  • Vocalization (Different voices from scared to agro)


Number of Audio Waves: 138

Number of Audio Cues: 138

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz 24Bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (Some of them Do)

Minutes of audio provided: 6:40

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: NONE
